Нацеленность на саморазвитие в выбранной: Commitment to self-development in the chosen field, including continuous learning
Имеется опыт разработки с использованием: Experience in development with Angular(2+) and RxJS
Разработка и поддержка UI-приложения (до: Development and maintenance of a UI application (adding new features, updating dependencies)
Рефакторинг кода, устранение codeSmells: Refactoring code, fixing code smells and other issues identified by SonarQube
Разработка Unit и e2e тестов фронтенд ча: Development of unit and e2e tests for the frontend
Разрабатываемое приложение относится к с: The developed application pertains to the fintech sector (for JSC 'AlfaBank'). It is built based on a microservices architecture;
Основная используемая технология — Реакт: The main technology used is React, along with NodeJS;
В сфере ответственности имеются модули,: The scope of responsibility includes modules written in both class-based and functional approaches;
В качестве стейт-менеджера — используетс: RTK, including RTK Query, is used for state management. Jest and Cypress libraries are used for test development. Modules of the application are connected via WMF (Webpack). There is active use of the Core-components library. Identified vulnerabilities are fixed using AppSec;
В качестве дополнительной нагрузки осуще: Additionally, there is the responsibility of preparing educational presentations on technical topics for newly hired junior specialists.
asist-description1: Development of UI applications with different technologies (React, NextJs, Angular(2+))
asist-description2: An outsourcing company specializing in working with clients from Israel, Europe, and the USA. I improved my English language skills there.
asist-description3: Also, working there I had the opportunity to use a wide range of development tools (Node (Express), React, Next, Angular (with extensive using RxJS)), and to participate in the development of various front-end applications (an application for an eye surgery clinic, a CRM system with extensive functionality for an American client, an online portal for customers and service providers in the entertainment industry…).
Академия Министерства внутренних дел Рес: Academy of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Republic of Belarus
Разработка веб-сайтов с использованием H: Website Development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
The project is developed with vanilla JavaScript.
Основная цель - разобраться на практике: The main goal is to deal in practice with those difficulties that can be easily solved using various frameworks or the React library. It's useful for a deeper understanding of the development process.
В проекте применен осмысленный подход к: The project uses a meaningful approach to the construction of its architecture. The application is clearly divided into a core and an interface. The core implements the bussines logic, and the interface displays the visual part. The interface interacts with the core through an adapter created for this purpose. A unidirectional data flow is implemented.
При разработке интерфейса использован ко: A component-based approach was used in the development of the interface. The application is incomplete. From now on, it is planned to add the ability to play online.
Проект подготовлен на React кастомной сб: The project was developed on React custom build (create-react-app was not used) using TypeScript. It is a website for posting articles by various authors.
Для логина следует использовать никнэйм: To log in, use the nickname 'admin' and the password '123'
Webpack is used as the bundler. Due to the fact that the create-react-app was not used, the bundler was configured manually, and many plugins and loaders were added.
Основная цель - прокачаться не только в: The main goal is to upgrade not only React skills, but also learning related technologies, including those related to the infrastructure of web applications. UI design is not a strong point of this project, since the purpose of its development is not related to the study of design.
В качестве архитектурного подхода выбран: FSD was chosen as the architectural approach
К настоящему моменту в проекте реализова: To date, the project has implemented:
Настроен сборщик, его конфиг декомпозиро: The bundler is configured, its config is decomposed. During configuring, environment variables were used; loaders and plugins which are necessary for the correct operation of the application were added;
Организована работа со стилями, при кото: Working with styles is organized. Due to its organization adding color themes is a simple task. Several color themes have also been added;
Реализован роутинг с ленивой подгрузкой;: Routing with lazy loading is implemented;
Подключен и настроен Redux Toolkit с аси: The Redux Toolkit with asynchronous reducers is connected and configured;
Реализована авторизация и добавлен серве: Authorization has been implemented and a server has been added to process requests. The server is designed for the NodeJS platform;
Разработаны модули профиля, статьи;: Profile and articles modules have been developed;
Пагинация списка статей реализована чере: Pagination of the articles list is implemented through infinity scroll;
Добавлены фильтры, сортировки и поиски с: Added filters, sorting and article searches
Разработан ESLint plugin который загруже: The ESLint plugin has been developed which is loaded into NPM and then installed;
Проект далеко не является законченным, п: The project is far from complete, there is a constant addition and improvement in the process of studying various development tools.
